item desired.Name: Elm
item desired.Text: (Dr. Phoenix. How are you connected to these flashbacks?)

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: Were you looking for something just now, Doc?

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: Wait -- don't tell me. You've also lost something?

item desired.Name: Dr. Phoenix
item desired.Text: As a matter of fact, I have. I can't seem to find some of my medicine.

item desired.Name: Dr. Phoenix
item desired.Text: It's all rather distressing. I'm already on a shortage of medicines. I can't afford to misplace them like this.

item desired.Name: Elm
item desired.Text: (Maybe then I can ask him about those flashbacks.)

item returned.Name: Dr. Phoenix
item returned.Text: You really found it! You startled me, running off like that all of a sudden. Where was it, if I may ask?

item returned.Name: Elm
item returned.Text: You - I suspect you just dropped it while you were walking. It was near some bushes outside.
